title: Late Night Lit: Michelle Hart | Rakesh Satyal
description:
On this month's episode of Late Night Lit, Late Night's Sarah Jenks-Daly talks to Michelle Hart, author of "We Do What We Do in the Dark," and  Rakesh Satyal, executive editor at HarperOne and an award-winning novelist.
